mapper.update:
UPDATE channel_service_field_config
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId},
channel_code = #{channelCode},
channel_service_name = #{channelServiceName},
channel_service_type = #{channelServiceType},
src_field_name = #{srcFieldName},
src_field_type = #{srcFieldType},
src_parent_field_name = #{srcParentFieldName},
field_description = #{fieldDescription},
target_field_name = #{targetFieldName},
target_field_type = #{targetFieldType},
target_parent_field_name = #{targetParentFieldName},
target_parent_field_type = #{targetParentFieldType},
check_rute = #{checkRute},
format_rute = #{formatRute},
state = #{state},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
